channel.title: Can't login (please help me!)
channel.description: HI Mopar members! I had previously posted this topic, but unfortunatly i had no hits! I need serious help. I have helped my friend complete a server, and i need to do more coding because i'm basicly the real owner, I do have a router, but im not hosting the server, He says people are going on the server, but i can't for some reason. I am using Windows Vista Home Premiuem 32-bit, Please anyone, help me.

item.title: Can't login (please help me!)
item.dc:creator: @iKilem iKilem
item.description:
@iKilem wrote:

Hmm, not really sure what the problem is. I guess you could try using the same client as everyone else.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

[quote=“iKilem, post:4, topic:302090”]Ok, because the client you use has to connect to the same IP address the server is running from.[/quote] OH SO THATS WHAT YOU WERE TALKING ABOUT, i always change the client’s ip. and BTW im the owner of the IP, at NO-IP
